definition: archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive

sentences.english: He taught them that the Word of God is our foundation.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌教他們上帝的話是我們的根基。

sentences.english: What we have got as Jesus teaching is only a partial of it.
sentences.chinese: 我們有什麼作爲耶穌教只是局部的。

sentences.english: In the context of what Jesus teaches there is never any justification for war.
sentences.chinese: 在對耶穌教上沒有什麼理由的戰爭。

sentences.english: The local ministers would remain in TJM for a month in a stretch.
sentences.chinese: 每次當地的長執都會留在真耶穌教團一個月。

sentences.english: Jesus teaches us how to live in the present time.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌教給了我們度現世生活的方法。

sentences.english: Our job is to teach the children thru jesus to be happy.
sentences.chinese: 我們的工作就是透過耶穌教給孩子快樂。

sentences.english: Well Jesus is teaching us to love one another.

definition: millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united
Double Tenth, the anniversary of the Wuchang Uprising 武昌起義|武昌起义[Wu3 chang1 Qi3 yi4] of October 10th, 1911/(Tw) National Day
anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4
